about.title: About Melody Mind
about.description: Test your music knowledge in various categories

intro: Dive into the fascinating world of music! At Melody Mind, you can prove your music knowledge in exciting quiz rounds. Answer questions about songs from different decades, artists, albums, and music history. Collect points, earn golden records, and challenge other music enthusiasts. From rock to pop, hip-hop to classical - test your knowledge in your favorite genres. Start your musical quiz adventure now!

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: Welcome to MelodyMind! Your goal is to answer questions about songs, artists, and albums from various music genres. Choose a genre and put your knowledge to the test. The more questions you answer correctly, the more points you'll earn.

difficultyLevels.title: Difficulty Levels
difficultyLevels.intro: There are three difficulty levels you can choose from:

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: 10 questions per round. Perfect for refreshing your knowledge and having fun.

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: 15 questions per round. A challenge for advanced music lovers.

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: 20 questions per round. Only for true music experts!

titles.intro: Each difficulty level has its own title that you can unlock:

novice.title: Music Novice
novice.description: Answered all questions correctly in easy mode.

master.title: Music Master
master.description: Answered all questions correctly in medium mode.

legend.title: Music Legend
legend.description: Answered all questions correctly in hard mode.

goldenRecords.title: Golden Records
goldenRecords.intro: When answering all questions correctly in a category, you'll receive a golden record:

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.text: The ranking system compares you with other players. Placement in the top 10 is based on your collected points across all categories.
lists: Genre-specific ranking: Best players of a genre.
Overall ranking: Best players across all categories.

tipsAndTricks.title: Tips & Tricks
tips: Start in easy mode to get a feel for the game.
Choose your strengths and play the genres you're confident in.
Practice regularly to improve your score.
Accuracy over speed – read each question carefully.

gameHome.title: Choose a category to play
gameHome.description: Discover the fascinating world of music through different decades and genres

50er.title: 50s
50er.description: Dive into the golden era of Rock 'n' Roll, Jazz, and Blues with legends like Elvis Presley, Chuck Berry, and Miles Davis

60er.title: 60s
60er.description: Experience the era of the British Invasion, Psychedelic Rock, and Motown with The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and more
